column3: Latest;Kampong Chhnang Province: At 2:30 on Wednesday afternoon
column4: Kampong Tralach District  police force detained a gangster who was------ filmed attacking ------other youths with a samurai sword on Tuesday evening.------The suspect
column6: a 23-year-old was arrested the day after the ruckus at 15:40 pm
column10: following much outrage from the general public.------Cambo Press
